entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
